# Complete the minimumAbsoluteDifference function below.
def minimumAbsoluteDifference(arr):
    arr.sort()
    min_diff = abs(arr[0] - arr[1])
    for i in range(1, len(arr)-1):
        min_diff = min(min_diff, abs(arr[i] - arr[i+1]))
    return min_diff
